Package io.vertigo.struts2.impl.tags.div

Class Div

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.struts2.components.Component
      • org.apache.struts2.components.UIBean
        • org.apache.struts2.components.ClosingUIBean
          • io.vertigo.struts2.impl.tags.div.Div
  • public final class Div
extends org.apache.struts2.components.ClosingUIBean
    Creates an HTML <div> Resurrect the Struts2 2.3.x DivTag. It doesn't do anything, and we could it to specify division with a layout : table or grid
    Author:
    npiedeloup
